USER.resetPasswordMessage: An email with information has been sent. Please follow the instruction in the mail to reset your password
USER.afterSignupText: Your account has been created. In order to validate your subscription, please follow the link we’ve sent you by mail
USER.afterSignupConfirmation: Your account is now valid. Welcome to Bloggyfoot

MAIL_SIGNUP_CONFIRMATION.subject: Bloggyfoot: account validation
MAIL_SIGNUP_CONFIRMATION.title: Bloggyfoot: please activate your account
MAIL_SIGNUP_CONFIRMATION.text: Welcome to Bloggyfoot. In order to validate your subscription, please follow the link we’ve sent you by mail

MAIL_PASSWORD_RESET.subject: Bloggyfoot: change your password
MAIL_PASSWORD_RESET.title: Bloggyfoot: change your password
MAIL_PASSWORD_RESET.text: In order to change your password, please click on the link below

MAIL_GROUP_CREATION.subject: Bloggyfoot: your League has been created
MAIL_GROUP_CREATION.title: Bloggyfoot: league creation
MAIL_GROUP_CREATION.text: We confirm the création of your League : '{{group}}’, password : '{{password}}'. You can now share this information with your friends, colleagues and invite them to join you. You also received a mail you only have to transfer in order to invite them. Enjoy!

MAIL_GROUP_INVITATION.subject: I challenge you on Bloggyfoot!
MAIL_GROUP_INVITATION.title: Bloggyfoot - Euro 2021 : free prediction contest
MAIL_GROUP_INVITATION.text: Hello, I just created a free prediction contest on Bloggyfoot and invites you to join us. Once you subscribed, you only have to join the contest '{{group}}’, password : '{{password}}'. May the best win!

LABEL.__day_inactive: The predictions for the final stage will be online at the end of the group stage.
